attributes.action: Proportional representation (STV) enacted before the next UK general election
attributes.additional_details: To stop the liberal democracy of the UK from being undermined and centuries old safegaurds of rule of law, tolerance, balance, free speech and defence from foreign interference being potentially lost forever.
attributes.background: UK Government to publish a bill for a referendum to change the British constitutiion by changing the electoral system to a full proportional representative model with a referendum to be held by 2026 and -if confirmed by 50%+ vote to be enacted in legislation so the new vote can be held by 2028/29.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action: 

"Use Proportional Representation at the next General Election" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728017

"Replace First-Past-The-Post with Single Transferrable Vote & Alternative Vote"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727860
